##GRANDPA, I hope you never learn how to use a smartphone

WMSYGSDR

Functional introduction, each line has a serious person, even ordinary people have extraordinary stories. Huazhong University of Science and Technology Press Official non-fiction story platform, the story of the people will meet here.

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
“

- coming-of-age stories.-yeah

Even though my grandfather had been shot and killed in the jungles of Vietnam, he was fearless. But when I'm not home, he's GonNa wake up alone in an empty room, and he's GonNa be lonely. He's been strong all his life, and he's never been beaten, and maybe his smartphone is just a reason he doesn't want to admit he's lonely.

”

“

- coming-of-age stories.-yeah

Even though my grandfather had been shot and killed in the jungles of Vietnam, he was fearless. But when I'm not home, he's GonNa wake up alone in an empty room, and he's GonNa be lonely. He's been strong all his life, and he's never been beaten, and maybe his smartphone is just a reason he doesn't want to admit he's lonely.

- coming-of-age stories.-yeah

Even though my grandfather had been shot and killed in the jungles of Vietnam, he was fearless. But when I'm not home, he's GonNa wake up alone in an empty room, and he's GonNa be lonely. He's been strong all his life, and he's never been beaten, and maybe his smartphone is just a reason he doesn't want to admit he's lonely.

”

Story exercise

Title 64

1.

After grandma died last October, the family discussed buying a smartphone for GRANDPA.

Although GRANDPA and parents are only the distance between the West end of the yard and the east end of the yard, they also eat together. But the family felt that the old couple in a house for a lifetime, suddenly left only one grandfather, inevitably lonely. His smartphone allows him to chat and talk to family members at any time, and he can watch videos and listen to cross talk when he is bored.

In any case, with the addition of new things, GRANDPA's life will be relatively rich some, for slowly accustomed to a new life is also a buffer.

Before this, GRANDPA had never used a smartphone, the volume is big, the button big old machine is his standard equipment.

But it seems that because of the age limit, GRANDPA's ability to learn to use a cell phone is not strong. In his hands, easy to learn the elderly machine, is also a problem at both ends of the day, either mute can not find people, or unwittingly dial out the phone. Grandma fought with him a lot about the phone.

Last spring, GRANDPA rode his bike to the field for a walk, to see the fields full of green wheat seedlings, the face is the warm spring after the wind, on a whim to stay in the field for a while. When it was time to go home, took out his cell phone, only to see a dozen missed calls from his grandmother.

The grandfather got on his bike and hurried home. Upon entering the house, grandma quarreled with him and asked him why he didn't answer the phone and fell on the ground due to high blood pressure.

The grandfather was stubborn and insisted, with his neck up, that he had not heard. Two old people quarrel, I secretly put GRANDPA's mobile phone to take a look, this just know, GRANDPA put the mobile phone into mute. But when I asked him, he couldn't even put it on silent.

Grandma scolded GRANDPA stupid, even can't use a cell phone. Grandfather although know grandma is good for him, mouth or not admit defeat, while walking to the yard while mumbling grandma nonsense, he clearly will use.

After that, whenever GRANDPA went out, I would check his cell phone before letting him go out. Grandma's concern is not without reason, GRANDPA has seventy-six, and perennial high blood pressure, need to take medication to maintain, once out of the door suddenly can not be contacted, the family will inevitably be anxious.

So before buying my grandfather a smartphone, my biggest concern is his ability to learn, something he hasn't learned yet, let alone a smartphone.

GRANDPA, by contrast, is not worried, after learning that he is about to own a smartphone, every now and then said that his old age machine is old, it should be eliminated. I know, he's reminding us all, in disguise, of the need to buy him a new phone -- an old man's mind, in a way that is instantly recognisable and almost comical.

I asked him, would you use it? GRANDPA immediately glared, put on a pair of undoubted manner, "I what can't learn? "

Soon, my parents took Grandpa to the mall and bought a Huawei honor. The grandfather who got the new mobile phone was so happy that he couldn't wait to open the package when he got home to find out what had happened.

But only when he took out his mobile phone, he found himself facing the hands of this bright smooth "glass plate" can not start.

"How come there's not even a button to turn it on? " GRANDPA turned the phone over and over, still wondering how to turn it on, so he took it to me for help.

"How about that? It's not that simple, " I told my grandfather. smartphones seem easy to learn and difficult to learn, especially for the elderly.

GRANDPA did not admit that he could not learn, face a Yang, and brought up his glorious past, "like when the anti-american aid Vietnam, I am a communications squad leader, how complex transmitter I can operate. "

"THAT HOW MOBILE PHONE WON'T BE? " I lift an eye, secretly smile to observe GRANDPA's facial expression.

GRANDPA was asked for a moment, just pretend not to hear, with a finger pointed to the phone said, "continue to teach, continue to teach. "

2.

Ever since GRANDPA got his new cell phone, Dad was always afraid he'd be gone too long.

In the past, grandma mobility inconvenience, can not leave people around, even if GRANDPA will go back as soon as possible. After grandma died, GRANDPA didn't want to stay in the house all the time, and it became his regular activity to go to the fields every morning and afternoon to see the crops.

When one day dad received a phone call from GRANDPA, but there came a strange voice, Dad's heart thump for a while.

GRANDPA was a veteran of the war against the United States and Vietnam, and the state paid him a monthly stipend. But since there was no postal savings bank in the village, at the end of the month, GRANDPA rode his bike to the bank in the town to withdraw money. It was more than twenty kilometers back and forth.

My grandfather's young military uniform photo and the military merit badge of resisting the United States and aiding Vietnam.

With his military background, GRANDPA, though seventy-six, was still in good health. He is 1.75 meters tall and can eat two big bowls of rice. He worked faster than anyone when he was still working in the fields a few years ago. So he was not afraid of the distance, always with his parents said, "I am fine, slowly ride, an hour. "

Dad advised GRANDPA not to ride his bike to get it, he can drive more than 10 minutes to help him get it back. Grandfather obstinate, say oneself go out is to exercise the body, the person does not move stop bad. When he heard this, his father simply let him go.

That day, GRANDPA got up early as usual and went to town to get the money. It was winter, the temperature was low, and it was windy, so it was hard to ride.

Out of self-confidence in their physical strength, the grandfather had to ride all the way against the wind to the town, but just walked to the bank, because of physical exhaustion collapsed.

The Security Guard at the bank found GRANDPA's cell phone in his pocket and called Dad, who drove to town to take him to the hospital.

After a check-up, fortunately, the body is not serious. The doctor said that GRANDPA was overtired from riding the bike, resulting in a lack of blood supply to the brain, and needed to be in the hospital for a few days infusion.

GRANDPA was soon admitted to the hospital. Lying in a hospital bed, he told his father was still awake after falling down, originally intended to call his father, did not think of a nervous forgot how to open the phone. Just then the bank guard noticed him and ran over to help him unlock the lock screen before dialing the phone.

When I heard the news from my parents, I couldn't help feeling a little scared. Fortunately, GRANDPA fell in the crowd gathered in front of the bank, if this fall in a corner no one through, the consequences can not be imagined.

My parents and I said, there is no danger this time, after not to let grandpa out, afraid of him again.

But I don't think GRANDPA would have approved, with his stubbornness to sneak out. He told his parents that the problem was that he couldn't use a smartphone. Two people in the video can not help but wry smile at me, "those days in hospital, teach him every day, the next day or forget. "

"nothing, such as winter vacation home, I live with him, learn not I have been teaching. " I said.

3.

The examination week of Big Three last term finally past, I return to the heart like an Arrow, sat the bullet train that sent from Shenyang to hometown.

From the Liaozhong plain all the way to Shanhai Pass, the frozen earth outside the window is rather bleak. Four hours away, all I could think about was spending the winter with my grandfather.

When I got home, I quickly packed up my books to study, put on a quilt and moved into my grandfather's house.

Years ago a few days, GRANDPA at home untenable, nothing to go to their field around, to see others fishing pit edge, in the mood will also push a few Pai Gow in the game.

Seeing that my grandfather had his own entertainment every day and didn't mention the smartphone, I also temporarily forgot to teach him how to play the phone.

After the New Year's Eve, the epidemic quickly became urgent. Several new cases of coronary pneumonia were confirmed in my county. All villages in the city immediately implemented the policy of closing the village. Township leaders are down every day to patrol, visits were expressly prohibited, the streets, the land no longer allow loitering people.

Under the strict policy, the grandfather who had always been free suddenly had nowhere to go. The old man had to stay at home every day, look at the garlic sprouts in the bed, tidy up the miscellaneous things in the house. After a nap, when the sun is good, take out a semiconductor, in the yard is a listen to half a day.

I sat next to my grandfather and watched him change the channel with a semiconductor every once in a while, as the loud, malfunctioning electrical signals from the loudspeakers filled me with the emptiness of his spiritual world.

Grandma in the world, although two people often quarrel, but there is a person with the total will not be lonely. After grandma left, GRANDPA loved to hang out and let the epidemic play out, and his only pastime was limited.

My parents and I can still kill time by playing with mobile phones and computers during the closing days of the village, but for my grandfather's generation, the technological underdevelopment of the old society has led them to do not know how to get along with the information age. The lack and monotony of entertainment amplified GRANDPA's boredom during the epidemic.

It occurred to me that I could teach my grandfather to use his smartphone while the village was shut down.

4.

The That Evening Sun was still full, and I went into the house, took out my grandfather's cell phone, and told him again from beginning to end how to turn it on and off, and how to make a call, and asked him to show me how to do it.

In the face of my test, GRANDPA is a little rusty. Apparently, during my absence, my grandfather rarely used his smartphone, and these basic functions were slowly being forgotten.

Time passed little by little, and in a twinkling the sun went down. In my repeated teaching, GRANDPA finally reviewed almost. I downloaded Kuaishou and the Himalayas to his phone and told him that the orange APP could be used to watch videos and the red APP could be used to listen to crosstalk.

"So many things in this little machine? " My grandfather pointed to his cell phone and looked at me half-heartedly.

I showed it to my grandfather and showed him several videos one by one. It was as if he had discovered a new continent, sliding the screen as he tried to tell me, "wow! THAT'S PRETTY AMAZING! "

Next, I taught him how to find the skit audio album in the Himalayas -- Grandfather was so fond of Zhao Benshan's skit that when he heard the skit on his phone, he handed it to me and said, "Come on, come on, Zhao Benshan's out. Turn it up. "

The grandfather spent the rest of the afternoon sitting in the That Evening Sun, listening to the skits, the lines on his face swimming merrily like fish, and his legs dangling from the chair in the breeze.

My grandfather, who had just tasted the benefits of a smartphone, got cocky and told me, "it's not that hard. I just didn't study hard. " I would hold back my laughter and allow the old man to enjoy the small sense of accomplishment.

A few days later, learning to use Kuaishou and Himalayan grandfather unwilling to stand still, and I put forward the idea of playing wechat.

My grandfather rarely took the initiative to explore new things, I used his mobile phone number to give him registered Wechat, and found the family's old photo album, wearing red flowers when grandpa young military photos taken as his head shot.

I introduced my grandfather to the wechat interface and how to pronounce the voice, he complained while learning that the smart character is small, if only there were a word as big as an old machine.

I just remembered that you can adjust the font size in the menu bar of Wechat. After some operation, the font of the system became huge, GRANDPA was squinting his eyes immediately opened a lot, "well, this time see clearly! "

GRANDPA learning to use wechat gap, I pulled him into the family group chat, which in addition to our three, there are respectively living in the city and Shandong sister-in-law, aunt two families. I put the phone close to GRANDPA's mouth to let him make a voice, grandpa carefully into the phone speaker said: "has everyone eaten? "

I laughed and told him he needed to press the button before he spoke. GRANDPA tried again before the voice was sent out.

The crowd was full of excitement because GRANDPA had joined in, and the messages quickly returned. Second Aunt Kua old man fashion, elder sister-in-law also said, "to buy him a smartphone finally come in handy. "

I then set up a video call for my grandfather. Looking at the family members appearing one after another on the mobile phone screen, GRANDPA was both novel and happy. He chatted with his family members one sentence at a time, asking first aunt and second aunt what they had for lunch, and telling them that the epidemic situation was serious, don't go anywhere.

A long time did not get together a large family in the small mobile phone screen to achieve a reunion. I wonder if it is because of touching, GRANDPA smiled and dropped a drop of tears, he took out a handkerchief wipe eyes while explaining: "old is easy to shed tears. "

Mother for a moment some regrets, can not help facing the camera and the family said: "The group has the old man, is a complete home. "

5.

After learning how to use WECHAT, GRANDPA made video calls to aunt and aunt. He said he could see his two daughters, and even when they weren't around, it was a lot of fun.

But at the same time, along with the convenience of communication, there are a lot of problems about mobile phones.

Because of the forgetfulness, grandpa always mistook the phone for the Wechat logo, because both apps are green and white in color, and he sometimes gets dizzy and can't see clearly.

I explained to him over and over again which was the phone and which was wechat. Still, he couldn't get the screen to click properly, or he'd click in the wrong place and end up in an interface he couldn't understand, or he'd slip back into his old phone and accidentally dial the phone.

One day at four in the morning, before dawn, I was awakened by the sound of voices. When I opened my eyes, I realized that my grandfather was talking to someone on the phone.

Opposite is a strange female voice, repeatedly asked who is the grandfather, what is the matter. GRANDPA to the mobile phone some prevaricate, his mouth kept saying, "can not close, can not close. " Tone is unable to hide the panic.

I quickly got out of bed, without shoes on, went to his bedside to help him back to the call interface, pressed the hang button.

Back in bed, the cold feet did not ease up, I can not help but whisper a sentence: "It is not dawn how to play the phone? Will not use the smartphone with the elderly computer. "

I fell back into a deep sleep, half asleep, and there came a faint sound of a lock-screen, and there was no sound in the room except the breathing of two men.

When I got up in the morning, I talked about it at the dinner table in front of my parents, complaining that my grandpa couldn't be so crazy about his cell phone. After parents hear, also joined my grandfather's "crusade" , have told him not to get up so early to play mobile phones.

I thought GRANDPA was going to contradict us or deny using the phone. But what I didn't expect was that GRANDPA was contrary to his usual obstinacy, he sighed and said, "I woke up after 4:00 and couldn't sleep. I didn't want to make any noise when I got up, which affected your sleep. I was lying in bed and didn't know what to do, so I fiddled with my cell phone. Unexpectedly, my hand shook and I dialed the phone again. "

I bow to drink porridge, no longer speak, nose suddenly sour. I thought, maybe since grandma left, GRANDPA will wake up very early every day, and then lie in bed quietly waiting for the morning.

This small piece of "Glass Plate" , as if carrying something unspeakable.

6.

The latter half of winter vacation, I reorganized their own teaching methods, the process of using mobile phone to teach grandpa a lot of patience.

GRANDPA also learned quickly, not only using a few apps quite skillfully, but also learned to take photos with his mobile phone. I told him that when the epidemic was over and he went on another field trip, he could take pictures of the scene and keep them in his photo album.

In the meantime, every day my grandfather would share with me the news he'd just heard on his phone about the decline in the number of confirmed cases, show me some videos of the epidemic, and figure out how long it would take him to get around the country.

I told him, I do not go home after school days to look at the phone less, more out and about. My mother heard this and said, "don't worry, your grandfather is not idle, he would have been badly suffocated at home. "

February 2 Dragon head of the day, after firecrackers, eat dumplings, the village barber army brother came home to Grandpa, Dad and my grandparents three people haircut.

Seeing his new smartphone in his GRANDPA's hand, Jun joked, "all the other old men are using the old-age phone. You've changed your life. " The whole family laughed.

Jun finished cutting dad's hair first, then GRANDPA. GRANDPA SAT on a stool, Jun gave GRANDPA surrounded by cloth, electric scissors buzz room, a bunch of gray hair fall to the ground.

While cutting his hair, junge and GRANDPA chatted, asked Grandpa what kind of crops to plant after spring, Grandpa told him that he had long since stopped farming.

Army elder brother is a little puzzled, ask GRANDPA how not to plant. GRANDPA smiled and exclaimed, "old, nearly eighty, do not move. "

At that moment, sitting in the courtyard of my heart was like a stab, eye socket quickly red up.

I realize that the days of winter vacation are numbered, and I will soon go back to school and continue to go to school, and at home is another six months time.

In a foreign country, and home contact only the occasional wechat and telephone, can be like this every day with Grandpa bask in the sun, listen to the sketch time is really not much.

I turned my head to look at my grandfather, who was sitting nearby talking to Jun, and suddenly I wished that such a day could last forever, even though I knew it was impossible.

It's a relief that GRANDPA has learned to use his smartphone. Because after I left home, he could always skype me when he missed me.

But I hope GRANDPA can never learn to use a smart phone.

When I was a young grandfather holding a year-old me, next to a cousin and cousin.

-END-

- I'm a storyteller. -

China Criminal Police College is a student of detective work, with hills and valleys on his pen and mountains on his shoulders. //

Author | florist brother, young author.
